short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improving Google search results through integration with ChatGPT
short.es: Mostrar la respuesta de ChatGPT junto con los resultados de la búsqueda en el motor de búsqueda
short.fr: Afficher la réponse de ChatGPT à côté des résultats des moteurs de recherche
short.he: הצג את תגובת ChatGPT לצד תוצאות מנוע החיפוש
short.hu: A ChatGPT válasz megjelenítése a keresőmotor eredményei mellett
short.ko: ChatGPT의 응답과 검색 엔진 결과를 함께 표시하라
short.pt_PT: Exibir a resposta do ChatGPT ao lado dos resultados dos mecanismos de pesquisa
short.ro: Afișați răspunsul ChatGPT alături de rezultatele motorului de căutare
short.uk: Показати відповідь ChatGPT з результатами пошуку
short.zh_CN: 在搜索引擎结果中同时显示ChatGPT的回答

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"ChatGPT for Google" is a Chrome extension that lets you access the power of OpenAI's language model, ChatGPT, directly from your browser. 

With this extension, you can ask ChatGPT anything and get an instant, accurate response. 

Whether you need information on a topic, help with a problem, or just some fun conversation, ChatGPT for Google has got you covered. 

Simply click on the extension icon, type in your question, and let ChatGPT do the rest or use Google Search like normal, the ChatGPT answer will appear on the right

This extension is perfect for students, researchers, and anyone who needs quick access to information. 
Get ChatGPT for Google today and experience the future of conversational AI!
